offences.wording:
ON TUESDAY 10-OCTOBER-2019 AT JACKSON STREET DISHONESTLY RECEIVED STOLEN GOODS NAMELY WATCH OF A VALUE UNKNOWN BELONGING TO HILDA ROBERTS KNOWING OR BELIEVING THE SAME TO BE STOLEN GOODS. CONTRARY TO SECTION 22(1) OF THE THEFT ACT 1968.
Contrary to section 4(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1988 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988.

results.resultText:
Imprisonment
Total custodial period 8 Weeks
Prison organisation name HMP/YOI Eastwood Park
Prison email address 1 Custody.Eastwoodpark@justice.gov.uk

Conveyor / custodian name email address 1 PECSCityofLondonMags@serco.com
Probation team to be notified organisation name South West and Central Division NPS
Probation team to be notified email address 1 SWSCNPS.Court@justice.gov.uk
Imprisonment Period 4 Weeks
Bail remand days to count (tagged days) 0
